Package drawnet.lib.solvers

Interface Summary
SolverListener A listener.
 

Class Summary
Exec A class that runs external processes.
Solver This is the root class for solvers and provide a basic common interface.
SolverDirect This is a abstract class to derive Java-based solvers from.
SolverDirectMarkov the Markov solver
SolverDirectNDA_Compose This class implements the solver for models conforming Network Dependent Automata formalism
SolverDirectSYS_flattering This class implements the solver for models conforming SYS formalism
SolverDirectX_Hit the Markov solver
SolverDirectX_Miss the Markov solver
SolverEvent A class representing events in a SolverListener.
SolverFilter This is an abstract class to derive solvers which use I/O filters.
SolverFilterAlgebra This is a class implementing the solver to interact with the external tool algebra for model composition.
SolverFilterAlgebra2 This is a class implementing the solver to interact with the external tool algebra for model composition.
SolverFilterFT This is a class implementing the solver to interact with the external tool DRPFTproc.
SolverFilterFT2 This is a class implementing the solver to interact with the external tool DRPFTproc.
SolverFilterGSPN This is a class implementing the solver to interact with the external tool GreatSPN.
SolverFilterITPN This is a class implementing the solver to interact with the external tool GreatSPN.
SolverFilterMGMTS This is a class implementing the solver to interact with the external tool GreatSPN.
SolverFilterOsMoSys This is a class implementing the solver to interact with the external tool OsMoSys.
SolverLauncher This is a intermediate abstract class all solvers derive from.
SolverManager This class manages formalism-solver associations.
SolverThread This class is used to execute a solver in a thread.
